alert.note: Alert for Cooper; Saline (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 05 at 9:22PM CDT until May 10 at 9:17PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri... Blackwater River at Valley City affecting Johnson MO and Pettis Counties. Blackwater River near Blue Lick affecting Saline and Cooper Counties. For the Blackwater River...Moderate flooding is forecast for Valley City...Minor flooding is forecast for Blue Lick. This product along with additional weather and stream information is available at www.weather.gov/kc/. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Blackwater River near Blue Lick. * WHEN...Until late Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Cropland and pastures along the river flood. At 29.0 feet, Livestock in pastures along the river may be endangered. Extensive damage also occurs to cropland and pasture. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:45 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 23.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 28.0 feet Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Monday evening. - Flood stage is 24.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Obs Forecasts Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat 7pm 7pm 7pm Blackwater River Blue Lick 24.0 23.7 Thu 1pm 23.9 26.8 27.7 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
